We have a new offer specifically designed for the low end market,  

£5 ($7 for LET members)  
Windows Server 2012R2  
1vCPU (AMD 4386)  
1GB RAM  
50GB HybridHDD  
Dedicated IP  
Shared 1Gbit connection (shared with upto 32 users, subject to fair use)  
https://secure.bigvps.io/cart.php?a=add&pid=16

We currently manually process orders, but are working on automation and a VM control panel. We aim to answer tickets within 12hrs
